content: I'll definitely try those tips out. By the way, I remember the last time I washed my car was on a Sunday, about three weeks ago, when the sun was finally out after a week of cloudy skies. I used the new car wash soap I bought from the auto store on Main Street, and it left my car looking great. Speaking of the auto store, do you know if they have any sales on air fresheners or microfiber cloths right now? I need to pick some up.
